title: Haricot, herb and ricotta dip
description: Simplicity itself. This fresh-tasting ricotta dip is a great vegetarian starter along with slices of carrot and breadsticks for dipping.
steps: Lightly crush the beans with a potato masher in a large mixing bowl.
Fold the beans together with the chopped herbs and the ricotta, without over mixing.
Trickle over the olive oil and serve.
